svg.title: System Features Overview — 18 Cross-Cutting Capabilities
svg.desc: Visual map of 18 system features organized by category: Workflow Controls, Credit Logic, Data Management, Quality Assurance, Formatting and Style, Business Rules. pinchfin dark theme.
svg.text: 18 cross-cutting capabilities embedded across the underwriting platform
research. Load existing data as baseline.
No vertical borders. Steel Grey dividers.
Features are not standalone modules — they are behavioral patterns
embedded across modules, skills, and system configuration
pinchfin — System Features Overview — 18 Cross-Cutting Capabilities
